extendedInfo.description: Want to improve your math and keep your brain reaction speed high? Download Number Tap, guaranteed to give you a mental workout! Practice Addition, Subtraction, Multiplication & Division across 2 great game modes! * Sums * Algebra Beautiful smooth animations and a minimal design make this app a pleasure to look at and use. This is the Perfect game to let your children play to help with school grades due to its educational nature. It helps to improve their cognitive skills by making them compare, count, add, subtract, multiply and divide. It starts off easy and gradually gets more difficult the more questions they get right, so kids are always encouraged to improve. Also this is great for college or university students wanting a quick brain train session to keep their mind focused when used as a study tool. What are you waiting for? Download Number Tap today and excel your math!

reviews.title: really great app
reviews.comment: keeps your brain in motion. A great way to keep your basic math skills in check
reviews.author: Melisa Fullager
